title: Kids Can Spend a Day at Hogwarts (by way of Mentor Library)
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Mentor - Today 
School's out this Friday, Oct. 16, for NEOEA Day, so why not spend the day at Hogwarts? For one day only, Mentor Public Library's turning it... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
